summary: Website for SCC Classes computer classes

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that introduces SCC Classes as a computer training institution, including a hero section with a welcoming headline and brief description of the services offered
Create a courses section that lists available computer training courses with descriptions and key details
Create a contact section with contact information for SCC Classes including a contact form for inquiries
Create an about section that provides information about SCC Classes, its mission, and teaching approach
Apply a professional, modern visual design theme with a cohesive color palette, typography, and layout style appropriate for an educational technology institution

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for SCC Classes computer classes
Update the backend getContactInfo function to return the new mobile number '+91 788 796 3508', email 'sccclasses@gmail.com', and address 'Old Jalna In Front of Devine English School (Dukhi Nagar)'
Ensure the ContactSection component displays the updated contact information from the backend
